title: @Riot Question Regarding "First Strike"
body:
Will there be a bundle for the Project skins released upon release? If so will buying the bundle grant first strike rewards?

Please answer, there are some people that have to budget their money just for these skins, and I need to know these details to know whether or not I can afford these skins upon initial release. Please and thank you.

replies.body: If you gift a Project skin during First Strike, will the recipient be awarded the special border?

There's no comment for that question on the PBE post yet. Since the purpose of making them full price the first week is that you get a limited edition bonus, I seriously seriously doubt they will lower the prices as a bundle (at least not the first week).

If you don't care about the limited edition borders, you can wait for the second week when they will be on discount prices as normal. Just keep checking the post below or watching the [Red Post Collection on Surrender@20.](http://www.surrenderat20.net/).

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/3qXbIdqV
Im new to the whole idea of PBE. I do not have a PBE account, but will I be able to buy the skins during the first week and get the special borders? I honestly hope I can, but doubt it.

**If you purchase any of the project skins (excluding yasuo's) during the first week of release you will receive the limited edition border** (if you don't receive it once the skins are re-enabled (after the first week) then you should submit a ticket (preferably with an image showing the purchase date of said skin(s) just to make it easier on riot employees).

Hey Rexolution,

We haven't announced any kind of bundle for the PROJECT: skins. Generally, we don't announce sales in advance. However, if there is a bundle, buying it during the first week would grant you the First Strike borders. 

As Deep Terror Nami mentioned, during the second week of release, 1350 RP skins will be reduced to 975 RP, but you won't receive the First Strike border.
